mapper.select: SELECT lockerNo from lockerTicket where lockerEndDate = #{today}
mapper.update: update lockerTicket SET lockerNo = #{lockerNo}, lockerUseDays = #{lockerUseDays}, lockerUsePrice = #{lockerUsePrice}, lockerEndDate = DATE_ADD(#{lockerStartDate}, INTERVAL #{lockerUseDays} DAY) WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lockerticket (lockerNo, userId, lockerUseDays, lockerUsePrice,lockerStartDate, lockerEndDate) VALUES ( #{lockerNo}, #{userId}, #{lockerUseDays}, #{lockerUsePrice},CURDATE(), DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{lockerUseDays} DAY));
